title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
tosdr.tldr:
Using >curl https://hp-67.com/terms.html on can find the last time of Terms of Service update in the EXAMPLE: curl https://hp-67.com/terms.html HP-67.com Terms of Service. This service does not track you, HP-67.com terms of service: freely surf the site; no need to register; if you download something give credit where credit is due. Since you never can upload anything to this website (service), "You maintain ownership of your data". That is it in a nutshell.



HP-67.com Terms of Service HP-67.com Privacy Policy
